ygData.subject: Reminder: put YOUR OWN contact URL in the User-Agent string
ygData.msgSnippet: We ve received a misdirected complaint about crawling, because some third party has placed our project URL (http://crawler.archive.org) in the User-Agent

From: "Gordon Mohr" <gojomo@...>
Subject: Reminder: put YOUR OWN contact URL in the User-Agent string
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=137285340
X-Yahoo-Profile: gojomo


We've received a misdirected complaint about crawling, because some
third party has placed our project URL (http://crawler.archive.org) 
in the User-Agent string of their crawl. 

Please do not do this. If running your own crawls with Heritrix (or any
other crawling software), the User-Agent string should contain an URL
associated with your project or organization, with contact information 
for the direct crawl operator. 

Crawls can go awry and have unintended impacts on remote servers, so 
you should always provide a way to be contacted by anyone affected. 

- Gordon @ IA
